findings.title: Inconsistent navigation pattern between pages
findings.description: Dashboard uses hamburger menu while other pages use top nav
findings.recommendation: Standardize navigation across all pages using consistent pattern

findings.title: Missing empty state for vehicle list
findings.description: When no vehicles exist, the page shows blank instead of helpful empty state
findings.recommendation: Add empty state with 'Add Your First Vehicle' CTA

agent_reports.summary: Agent U mock analysis complete. Found 2 issues.

findings.title: Unnecessary re-renders in VehicleCard component
findings.description: Component re-renders on every parent update due to inline function props
findings.recommendation: Wrap callback functions in useCallback hook

agent_reports.summary: Agent F mock analysis complete. Found 2 issues.

findings.title: No analytics tracking on vehicle creation
findings.description: Critical conversion event not tracked when user adds vehicle
findings.recommendation: Add trackEvent('vehicle_created', { vehicleType, source }) after successful creation

agent_reports.summary: Agent A mock analysis complete. Found 1 issues.

findings.title: Missing error boundary for SWR data fetching
findings.description: API failures cause entire component to crash
findings.recommendation: Wrap data fetching in error boundary and show fallback UI

agent_reports.summary: Agent R mock analysis complete. Found 1 issues.

findings.title: Map markers missing ARIA labels
findings.description: Leaflet map markers are not screen reader accessible (WCAG 2.1.1)
findings.recommendation: Add aria-label to each marker with vehicle information

findings.title: LCP exceeds 2.5s target
findings.description: Largest Contentful Paint is 3.2s due to unoptimized map tiles
findings.recommendation: Implement progressive loading for map tiles and lazy load below fold

agent_reports.summary: Agent Q mock analysis complete. Found 2 issues.

findings.title: Missing role-based access control on vehicle deletion
findings.description: All authenticated users can delete vehicles regardless of role
findings.recommendation: Add role check: if (!hasRole('admin')) return; before delete action

agent_reports.summary: Agent S mock analysis complete. Found 1 issues.

findings.title: Missing index on vehicles.created_at
findings.description: Queries sorting by date are slow without index
findings.recommendation: Add index: CREATE INDEX idx_vehicles_created_at ON vehicles(created_at DESC);

agent_reports.summary: Agent D mock analysis complete. Found 1 issues.

findings.title: Table not responsive on mobile
findings.description: Vehicle table overflows on mobile screens instead of stacking
findings.recommendation: Use card layout on mobile: display: grid on sm breakpoint

agent_reports.summary: Agent M mock analysis complete. Found 1 issues.

findings.title: Leaflet map API key exposed in client
findings.description: Map tiles URL contains API key visible in network tab
findings.recommendation: Move map tile requests through backend proxy

agent_reports.summary: Agent I mock analysis complete. Found 1 issues.

findings.title: No E2E tests for critical vehicle workflow
findings.description: Add vehicle -> View details -> Edit -> Delete workflow not tested
findings.recommendation: Create Playwright test covering complete vehicle CRUD workflow

findings.title: VehicleCard component has 0% test coverage
findings.recommendation: Add unit tests for all props combinations and interactions

agent_reports.summary: Agent T mock analysis complete. Found 2 issues.

recommendations: [CRITICAL] Missing empty state for vehicle list: Add empty state with 'Add Your First Vehicle' CTA
[CRITICAL] No analytics tracking on vehicle creation: Add trackEvent('vehicle_created', { vehicleType, source }) after successful creation
[CRITICAL] Map markers missing ARIA labels: Add aria-label to each marker with vehicle information
[CRITICAL] Missing role-based access control on vehicle deletion: Add role check: if (!hasRole('admin')) return; before delete action
[CRITICAL] No E2E tests for critical vehicle workflow: Create Playwright test covering complete vehicle CRUD workflow
[HIGH] Inconsistent navigation pattern between pages: Standardize navigation across all pages using consistent pattern
[HIGH] Props interface missing required fields: Add 'id: string' to VehicleProps interface
[HIGH] Missing error boundary for SWR data fetching: Wrap data fetching in error boundary and show fallback UI
[HIGH] LCP exceeds 2.5s target: Implement progressive loading for map tiles and lazy load below fold
[HIGH] Table not responsive on mobile: Use card layout on mobile: display: grid on sm breakpoint
